item.title: My First Post
item.description: ![Link to notebook]({{ $url := urls.Parse “https://nbviewer.org/github/daredevil94/SGI-Explainer-Notebook/blob/main/notebook.ipynb" }}) Ever wondered which Marvel character is happiest? Or saddest? Well wait no longer. we found out! We downloaded the wiki pages of every character and every movie that has been released from the marvel fandom wikipedia. Every hyperlink from one character page to another is deemed as a connection between those two. The text describing the character on the fandom page determines their happiness and sadness.
